name: GetEnterpriseTeams
description:
Retrieve list of teams in an enterprise organization.

This tool is used to obtain a list of teams for a given organization in the Enterprise plan of Miro. It requires the user to have the role of a Company Admin and proper authorization scopes. It is essential for enterprises needing to manage or view their organizational structure.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the organization to retrieve teams from.

parameters.name: maximum_results_limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of team records to retrieve. If not set, defaults to the API's default value.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: Indicator for page position in results. Leave empty for first page; use previous cursor for next pages.

value_schema.description: An indicator of the position of a page in the full set of results. To obtain the first page leave it empty. To obtain subsequent pages set it to the value returned in the cursor field of the previous request.

parameters.name: team_name_filter
parameters.description: Filters teams by name using case insensitive partial match. For example, 'dev' will return both 'Developer's team' and 'Team for developers'.

value_schema.description: Name query. Filters teams by name using case insensitive partial match. A value "dev" will return both "Developer's team" and "Team for developers".

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: An indicator of the position of a page in the full set of results. To obtain the first page leave it empty. To obtain subsequent pages set it to the value returned in the cursor field of the previous request.

value_schema.description: An indicator of the position of a page in the full set of results. To obtain the first page leave it empty. To obtain subsequent pages set it to the value returned in the cursor field of the previous request.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name query. Filters teams by name using case insensitive partial match. A value "dev" will return both "Developer's team" and "Team for developers".

value_schema.description: Name query. Filters teams by name using case insensitive partial match. A value "dev" will return both "Developer's team" and "Team for developers".

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
